venue.name: Dick's Last Resort Faneuil Hall Marketplace

item.description:
Last week, during a conversation with fellow happy hourer, 'Fenway' Frank, he kindly invited the Happy Ones (that would be us) to join the Red Sox Natives Meetup group at Dick's Last Resort for some happy hour Red Sox game watching.

We'll have pregame conversation and liquids at 6 PM to unwind before the excitement begins at 7 PM on the numerous TV screens.

Get there when you can and hang as long you're able. Don't be shy say hi to your fellow happy ones.

You're encouraged to bring a friend or two or three or four or more.....please add the number of guests with your RSVP.

If you want a 'box' seat, in other words, a spot at a reseved table you MUST RSVP YES and also answer the question about ordering grub. I would appreciate it if everyone who RSVPs Yes or Maybe answers the questions which show after you RSVP.

Here is a link with the drink & appetizer menu, http://boston.dicksla...

Check out this link, it is the dinner menu, http://boston.dicksla...

The Sox are playing in Philadelphia. The Phillies are in first place so it's expected to be a good game.

BarFlyz will take the stage from 10 PM til 1 AM. So if you like to dance, join me on the dance floor or just hang out and enjoy the band.

Check out http://mbta.com/... or http://www.hopstop.co... to create your route by public transit. Aquarium (blue line), Haymarket (green & orange lines), State (orange & blue lines), Government Center (blue & green lines), and South Station (red line & commuter rail) subway stations are no more than a ten (10) minute walk away.

AS ALWAYS YOU MUST MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER


Non Sox fans are welcome to join in the fun
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one NOT wearing Sox gear. Ask for the Red Sox Natives Party
item.name: Play Ball...Actually Let's Watch - Friday June 12th
